items.summary: Update the hardcoded admin credentials in `backend/main.mo` so that the `verifyAdminCredentials` function accepts exactly email `athiakash1977@gmail.com` and password `Akash@8667099605`. Ensure the stored password value and the comparison logic match this exact string with correct casing and special characters. The admin name should remain `Akash A`.

Update `frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx` to ensure the login form submits the password exactly as typed (no trimming, no transformation) and that the credential verification call uses the raw input values. Confirm the placeholder or pre-filled email field shows `athiakash1977@gmail.com`.
